We will annotate plots with titles, subtitles, captions, and plot text. We'll also add lines and shapes to the plot area.

## Learning objectives

* Add titles, subtitles, and captions to plots
* Adjust axes labels
* Add custom and data-mapped text to plot area
* Add diagonal, vertical, and horizontal lines, line segments, and shapes to plot area
